text: Francis McDonald (born 26 December 1975) is a former Saint Lucian footballer and current manager. ==Club career== During McDonald's playing career, he played for Saint Lucian clubs Northern United All Stars and NYAH. ==Managerial career== In 2018, McDonald managed former club Northern United All Stars. In October 2018, McDonald was appointed manager of Saint Lucia, before being replaced by Jamaal Shabazz on 5 May 2019. ==Managerial Statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Team !rowspan="2"|From !rowspan="2"|To !colspan="5"|Record |- !G!!W!!D!!L!!Win % |- |align=left|Saint Lucia |align=left|October 2018 |align=left|present |} ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Saint Lucian footballers Category:Northern United All Stars players Category:Saint Lucia national football team managers Category:Saint Lucian football managers
title: Francis McDonald (football)
